column1: Local Foods////I had previously given this location five stars and I've been here many times
column2: but today I got the vegan taco salad (which is my usual meal) and I kept getting this bizarre taste like spoiled milk every so often. I stopped eating it because I was scared I was going to get food poisoning
column3: and the jury is still out on that. For some reason
column4: saut√©ed squash was added to the salad as well
column5: which is not normally included on the salad
column6: so I'm not sure if those vegetables were bad or not. All in all
column7: it was a very disappointing visit.
